ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.provisioners

Class StorageIOProvisionerSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.provisioners.StorageIOProvisioner
      • ch.uzh.ifi.csg.cloudsim.rda.provisioners.StorageIOProvisionerSimple

  • public class StorageIOProvisionerSimple
extends StorageIOProvisioner
    storageIOProvisionerSimple is a class that implements a simple best effort allocation policy: if there is storageIO available to request, it allocates; otherwise, it fails.
    Author:
    Patrick A. Taddei
